alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 02 at 1:13PM EST until March 04 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Fayette, Higher Elevations of Fayette, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland, Indiana, and Westmoreland Counties. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
